titles.title: My Soul, Be on Thy Guard

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: Ne'er think the vict'ry won, nor once at ease sit down; the arduous work will not be done till thou hast got the crown.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Fight on, my soul, till death shall bring thee to my God; He'll take thee, at thy parting breath, up to His rest above.
